santander_denmark.help_text: If you repay your loan before the installment period of {{ duration_months }} month(s) expires, it only costs the startup fee: {{ startup_fee }}. There must always be a maturity of min. 12 months after the repayment period. When redeeming before time, contact the customer service of Santander Consumer Bank.
santander_denmark.i_am_member_of_unemplo: I am member of an unemployment insurance
santander_denmark.if_click_yes: If you click on "Yes", you give Santander Consumer Bank permission to contact you with news, offers of our products, contests and information about the opportunities and benefits for you as a customer. Of course, you can opt out again at any time.
santander_denmark.opening_hours.title: Opening Hours
santander_denmark.terms_text_modal:
I hereby give my consent to Santander being able to obtain information about my potential loans and credits from the banks and financing companies who are affiliated with KreditStatus. This information may only be used to evaluate my creditworthiness regarding this application with Santander.

Santander has the right to gather the following information about my existing loans and credits via KreditStatus: identification information, type of loan, principal amount of loan/credit max, formation time, and the current balance.

Information about which banks and financing companies that have access to gather information about my credit arrangements from KreditStatus is always available on www.kreditstatus.dk

I am an adult and I hereby confirm that the information I have stated is correct and in accordance with the truth.

I understand that during the processing of this application there will be made a creditworthiness investigation, and that during this investigation information about my economic conditions with credit information bureaus may be exchanged, and that the gathered information will be registered and processed.

I understand that Santander can choose to refuse to grant a loan, if the given information is incorrect, or if Santander in connection with credit approval receives information that impacts the rating.

Regardless of whether a customer relationship will be formed or not, all information stated in the application will be saved by Santander for at least 1 year.

I accept that a possible rejection will not be explained to me, unless it happens on the basis of a search in a database (for example RKI/debtors ledger).

I am aware that information will form a basis for Santander meeting the requirement in the Credit Agreement Act Â§ 7c on the assessment of me being able to repay the lent amount.

Santander can, after you have sent your application, contact you via phone, text message or email to hear if you have any questions regarding the application, our products, etc.
santander_installment_dk.concent: If you click on "Yes", you give Santander Consumer Bank permission to contact you with news, offers of our products, contests and information about the opportunities and benefits for you as a customer. Of course, you can opt out again at any time.

santander_installment_dk.help_text: If you repay your loan before the installment period of {{ duration_months }} month(s) expires, it only costs the startup fee: {{ startup_fee }}. There must always be a maturity of min. 12 months after the repayment period. When redeeming before time, contact the customer service of Santander Consumer Bank.
santander_installment_dk.labels.confirm_: By logging in with NemID and social security number, you create a secure connection, so you can get approved your loan easily, quickly and safely.
santander_installment_dk.labels.get_offe: Subscribe to our newsletters and keep up-to-date with news, offers and competitions from Santander Consumer Bank and our Partners. If you click on "Yes, please," you allow the Santander Consumer Bank to contact you by email and text with our newsletters as well as offers of our products consisting of car loans, consumer loans, savings, sales finance, insurance and credit cards. Of course, you can always sign up again.
Receive offers via sms or email
Should we contact you with offers and information about the opportunities and benefits you have as a customer?
santander_installment_dk.labels.give_con: Give consent to SKAT.dk with your NemID

We will redirect you to SKAT's homepage, where you via NemID will grant the approval that SKAT can share your annual tax return and salary information with us. We will only get access to information needed for this loan application.
santander_installment_dk.no_credit_optio: Sorry but no options available for selected product
santander_installment_dk.terms_and_condi:
I hereby give my consent to Santander being able to obtain information about my potential loans and credits from the banks and financing companies who are affiliated with KreditStatus. This information may only be used to evaluate my creditworthiness regarding this application with Santander.

Santander has the right to gather the following information about my existing loans and credits via KreditStatus: identification information, type of loan, principal amount of loan/credit max, formation time, and the current balance.

Information about which banks and financing companies that have access to gather information about my credit arrangements from KreditStatus is always available on www.kreditstatus.dk

I am an adult and I hereby confirm that the information I have stated is correct and in accordance with the truth.

I understand that during the processing of this application there will be made a creditworthiness investigation, and that during this investigation information about my economic conditions with credit information bureaus may be exchanged, and that the gathered information will be registered and processed.

I understand that Santander can choose to refuse to grant a loan, if the given information is incorrect, or if Santander in connection with credit approval receives information that impacts the rating.

Regardless of whether a customer relationship will be formed or not, all information stated in the application will be saved by Santander for at least 1 year.

I accept that a possible rejection will not be explained to me, unless it happens on the basis of a search in a database (for example RKI/debtors ledger).

I am aware that information will form a basis for Santander meeting the requirement in the Credit Agreement Act Â§ 7c on the assessment of me being able to repay the lent amount.

Santander can, after you have sent your application, contact you via phone, text message or email to hear if you have any questions regarding the application, our products, etc.

santander_installment_no.form.tooltip.po:
Choose yes if you or someone in your immediate family is a politically exposed person.
This includes:
-State head, Prime Minister / head of state, Minister, Deputy Minister / Deputy Minister
-Member of National Assembly
-Member of the Supreme Court
-Member of higher court statements who make decisions that can only be appealed exceptionally
-Member of the Board of Auditors, Court of Auditors
-Member of the central bank, Ambassador, Charge d`affaires
-Member of administrative, management or controlling body of a state-owned enterprise
- Higher ranking military officer
- Function in the management of an international organization
